item.title: By: Curved Light Solutions
item.dc:creator: Curved Light Solutions
item.description: They have a decent set of iOS widgets, there is a lack of parity with what is offered for Android ( at lease in the public release), I actually purchased a nice 3rd party library for Corona called Widget Candy. It has parity between iOS and Android and all widgets look the same on both platforms. In addition you can skin it to look like the native OS.

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: I think it makes sense for Ansca Mobile to focus on the hotest topic in mobile development. It's not only financially the best place to focus resources, but it's also the place where most developers need the most help. A lot of creative people would never be able to put together all the code to make game physics happen, but just about anyone can figure out how to connect a form to a database to store and retrieve data.
